title: Formula.1.2014.Abu.Dhabi.Grand.Prix.Qualifying.BBC.720p.50fps.HD
description:
Title..............: Formula 1 2014 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix Qualifying
 Source.............: HDTV   
 Resolution.........: 1280 x 720                                              
 Aspect Ratio.......: WS 1.777                                                 
 Framerate..........: 50 FPS                                                   
 Video Codec........: x264 @ CRF 22
 Audio..............: AC3 @ 192 kbps 48KHz 2ch	
 Source.............: BBC1 HD

 Part 1 (0:45:18)...: Pre-quali buildup. 
 Part 2 (1:23:04)...: Main sessions + post-quali discussion	

This is in mp4 format rather than my usual mkv to try and make the PS3 users a little happier :) The audio is still in AC3 format though, not AAC so depending on just how old your player is it may or may not work... Should be fine with things less than 4 years old I hope!		


Quite a lot of glitches in this, particularly bad at the beggining of Q1 and Q2 as well as the second half of the pre-show, Q3 seems to be fine... On the whole its quite watchable though
